TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerHost implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer, class System.IServiceProvider
type IDesignerHost = interface interface IServiceContainer interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 提供用于管理设计器事务和组件的接口。

span.span: Provides an interface for managing designer transactions and components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是适用于.NET Framework 窗体设计器结构，以便为设计器事务和组件管理提供支持的接口。 is an interface that works with the .NET Framework forms designer architecture to provide support for designer transaction and component management. .NET Framework 不提供此接口的实现。The .NET Framework does not provide an implementation of this interface. 通过支持设计器的开发工具实现该接口。The interface is implemented by development tools that support designers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从设计器或已就位的组件的服务接口。The following example code demonstrates how to obtain the service interface from a designer or sited component. [!code-cpp[DesignerHostAcquisition#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerHostAcquisition/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DesignerHostAcquisition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerHostAcquisition/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerHostAcquisition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerHostAcquisition/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用列表项目组件的接口。The following example code demonstrates using the interface to list project components. [!code-cpp[IDesignerHostExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerHostExample/CPP/idesignerhostexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerHostExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerHostExample/CS/idesignerhostexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerHostExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerHostExample/VB/idesignerhostexample.vb#1)]

para.span: 若要获取的实现从开发环境中，调用组件设计模式中处于活动状态时，传递的类型请求服务接口。

span.span: To obtain an implementation of from a development environment, call while your component is active in design mode, passing the type of to request an service interface.

para.span: 提供了与设计器状态相关的以下成员：

span.span: provides the following members related to designer state:

para.span: -属性指示是否正在加载设计器或文档。

span.span: - The property indicates whether a designer or document is being loaded.

para.span: -之前显示激活设计器时发生事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a designer is activated before display.

para.span: -停用一个设计器时发生事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a designer is deactivated.

para.span: -事件发生后加载文档。

span.span: - The event occurs after a document is loaded.

para.span: -方法激活设计器。

span.span: - The method activates the designer.

para.span: 提供了与管理组件相关的以下成员：

span.span: provides the following members related to managing components:

para.span: -属性指示设计器宿主的容器。

span.span: - The property indicates the container for the designer host.

para.span: -属性指示的根组件的基类。

span.span: - The property indicates the base class for the root component.

para.span: -属性指示的根组件的类名称。

span.span: - The property indicates the name of the class of the root component.

para.span: -方法创建指定的类型的组件。

span.span: - The method creates the specified type of component.

para.span: -方法销毁指定的组件。

span.span: - The method destroys the specified component.

para.span: -方法获取与指定组件关联的设计器。

span.span: - The method gets the designer associated with a specified component.

para.span: -方法获取具有指定名称的类型的实例。

span.span: - The method gets an instance of the type with the specified name.

para.span: 提供了与事务管理相关的以下成员：

span.span: provides the following members related to managing transactions:

para.span: -属性指示设计器是否在事务中。

span.span: - The property indicates whether the designer is in a transaction.

para.span: -属性指示当前的事务说明。

span.span: - The property indicates the current transaction description.

para.span: -事务完成时发生事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a transaction has been completed.

para.span: -以完成事务时，发生事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a transaction is about to be completed.

para.span: -事件发生时事务已开始。

span.span: - The event occurs when a transaction has begun.

para.span: -事务是将要开始时发生事件。

span.span: - The event occurs when a transaction is about to begin.

para.span: -方法创建并返回新的事务。

span.span: - The method creates and returns a new transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Activate() cil managed

summary.span: 激活此宿主所承载的设计器。

span.span: Activates the designer that this host is hosting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应激活设计器，然后它们将显示其用户界面。Designers should be activated before they display their user interface.

summary.span: 在激活此设计器时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this designer is activated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示前已激活设计器。A designer is activated before it is displayed.

public: property System::ComponentModel::IContainer ^ Container { System::ComponentModel::IContainer ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取此设计器宿主的容器。

span.span: Gets the container for this designer host.
The for this host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这包含当前的设计模式文档的组件。This contains the components of the current design mode document. 可以列出，也可以访问通过当前的设计模式文档的组件的任何此成员。You can list or access any of the components of the current design mode document through the member of this .

summary.span: 创建指定类型的组件，并将其添加到设计文档中。

span.span: Creates a component of the specified type and adds it to the design document.

span.span: The type of the component to create.

summary.span: 创建指定类型的组件，并将其添加到设计文档中。

span.span: Creates a component of the specified type and adds it to the design document.
The newly created component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果无法解析的类型实现的对象到，将引发异常。If the type cannot be resolved into an object that implements , an exception is thrown. 此方法不会指定组件的名称。This method does not specify a name for the component. 此方法创建组件，并将其添加到设计器的容器。The method creates the component and adds it to the designer container.

span.span: The type of the component to create.
The name for the component.

summary.span: 创建指定类型和名称的组件，并将其添加到设计文档中。

span.span: Creates a component of the specified type and name, and adds it to the design document.
The newly created component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果无法解析的类型实现的对象到，将引发异常。If the type cannot be resolved into an object that implements , an exception is thrown. 此方法创建组件，并将其添加到设计器的容器。This method creates the component and adds it to the designer container.

summary.span: 创建 ，它可封装事件序列以提高性能并启用撤消和重复支持功能。

span.span: Creates a that can encapsulate event sequences to improve performance and enable undo and redo support functionality.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction CreateTransaction() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 ，它可封装事件序列以提高性能并启用撤消和重复支持功能。

span.span: Creates a that can encapsulate event sequences to improve performance and enable undo and redo support functionality.
A new instance of .

returns.span: 在完成事务中的步骤后，应对此对象调用 。

span.span: When you complete the steps in your transaction, you should call on this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建可用于封装的一系列操作。This method creates a that can be used to encapsulate a series of operations. 设计器事务可以提高性能、 减少闪烁引起的操作的过程中的多个更新并启用撤消的大多数操作。Designer transactions can improve performance, reduce flicker caused by multiple updates during a process of operations, and enable most operations to be undone. 冗长的操作涉及多个组件可以引发多个事件。Lengthy operations that involve multiple components can raise many events. 这些事件可能导致副作用，如闪烁或性能下降。These events can cause side effects, such as flicker or degraded performance. 当多个组件上一次操作或单个组件上设置多个属性时，可以通过执行这些更改的事务中来提高性能。When operating on multiple components at one time, or setting multiple properties on a single component, you can improve performance by performing these changes within a transaction. 某些操作处理和事件，并仅当事务不处于正在进行时执行工作。Some operations handle the and events and perform work only when a transaction is not in progress. 使用事务的详细信息，请参阅的文档。For more information on using transactions, see the documentation for .

span.span: Creates a that can encapsulate event sequences to improve performance and enable undo and redo support functionality, using the specified transaction description.
A new .

returns.span: 在完成事务中的步骤后，应对此对象调用 。

span.span: When you have completed the steps in your transaction, you should call on this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建可用于封装的一系列操作。This method creates a that can be used to encapsulate a series of operations. 设计器事务可以提高性能、 减少闪烁引起的操作的过程中的多个更新并启用撤消的大多数操作。Designer transactions can improve performance, reduce flicker caused by multiple updates during a process of operations, and enable most operations to be undone. 冗长的操作涉及多个组件可以引发多个事件。Lengthy operations that involve multiple components can raise many events. 这些事件可能导致副作用，如闪烁或性能下降。These events can cause side effects, such as flicker or degraded performance. 当多个组件上一次操作或单个组件上设置多个属性时，可以通过执行这些更改的事务中来提高性能。When operating on multiple components at one time, or setting multiple properties on a single component, you can improve performance by performing these changes within a transaction. 某些操作处理和事件，并仅当事务不处于正在进行时执行工作。Some operations handle the and events and perform work only when a transaction is not in progress. 使用事务的详细信息，请参阅的文档。For more information on using transactions, see the documentation for .

span.span: Occurs when this designer is deactivated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不再显示之前，将停用一个设计器。A designer is deactivated just before it is no longer displayed.

public: property System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ RootComponent { System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用作当前设计的根组件的基类的实例。

span.span: Gets the instance of the base class used as the root component for the current design.
The instance of the root component class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此基类的类通常是或实例; 它定义为其用户的派生的类扩展的类。This base class is typically a or instance; it defines the class for which the user's derived class extends.

span.span: Gets the fully qualified name of the class being designed.

value.span: 基组件类的完全限定名。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the base component class.

summary.span: 添加 事件的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭事务后，将发生此事件。This event occurs after a transaction is closed. 事务有时会改变多个值。A transaction can sometimes change multiple values. 事务方法提供了一种方法来防止性能和通过避免重复处理闪烁的问题。The transaction methods provide a way to prevent performance and flicker problems by avoiding repetitive processing. 这些方法将处理推迟到该事务已关闭后。These methods defer processing until after the transaction has closed.

summary.span: 添加 事件的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务完成之前，将发生此事件。This event occurs just before a transaction is completed. 事务有时会改变多个值。A transaction can sometimes change multiple values. 事务方法提供了一种方法来防止性能和通过避免重复处理闪烁的问题。The transaction methods provide a way to prevent performance and flicker problems by avoiding repetitive processing. 这些方法将处理推迟到该事务已关闭后。These methods defer processing until after the transaction has closed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TransactionDescription As String
public: property System::String ^ TransactionDescription { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前事务的说明。

span.span: Gets the description of the current transaction.
A description of the current transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 说明是使用指定的最后一个描述。The description is the last description specified with .

summary.span: 添加 事件的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当事务已开始时，将发生此事件。This event occurs when a transaction has begun. 事务有时会改变多个值。A transaction can sometimes change multiple values. 事务方法提供了一种方法来防止性能和通过避免重复处理闪烁的问题。The transaction methods provide a way to prevent performance and flicker problems by avoiding repetitive processing. 这些方法将处理推迟到该事务已关闭后。These methods defer processing until after the transaction has closed.

summary.span: 添加 事件的事件处理程序。

span.span: Adds an event handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将要开始事务时，会发生此事件。This event occurs when a transaction is about to begin. 此方法允许设计器宿主客户端之前其他处理程序会收到通知事务已开始执行操作。This method allows designer host clients to perform operations before other handlers are notified that a transaction has begun. 指定的处理程序调用仅的首次调用到进行。The specified handler is called only when the first call to is made. 后续调用不会生成此事件之前被释放所有事务对象。Subsequent calls do not generate this event until all transaction objects have been disposed.
